feed.title: Chih Chia's Blog • Posts by "matlab" category

entry.title: 動畫 lesson 4
entry.content:
結合前面的介紹，我們可以將無人機飛行模擬結果繪製成動畫。

範例中的 MAT 檔 (auto_fly_90.mat) 裡面有兩個結構變數分別是飛行資料 data 和期望軌跡 desired_trajectory

  • data:

    • t: 時間
    • x: 無人機 x 位置
    • y: 無人機 y 位置
    • z: 無人機 z 位置
    • P:[x;y;z] 無人機位置
    • phi,theta,psi: 無人機姿態

  • desired_trajectory:

    • waypoint: 航點
    • x_d: 無人機期望 x 位置
    • y_d: 無人機期望 y 位置
    • z_d: 無人機期望 z 位置
    • phi_d,theta_d,psi_d: 無人機期望姿態
    • p: 小圖期望位置

# 成果展示:

範例的 STL 與 MAT 可以在這邊下載: 載點

# 程式碼:

%全地圖畫法
clc;clear;close all;

addpath 'Z:\My Drive\MATLAB\plot_function'
addpath(genpath('.\STL\450'))

load auto_fly_90.mat;

video_name='auto_fly_90';

%使用者設定開始

fuselage_color = [0.9,0.9,0.8];
propeller_color = [0 0 0];
data_color = 'b';
stl_amplification = 0.5;

reference_color = 'g';
waypoint_color = 'r';
time_window = 8;%sec

%使用者設定結束

%% 繪製動畫準備
video=figure();
set(video,'Position',[1 49 1.7067e+03 946],'color','w');%需放大錄製，不然畫質很差

subplot('Position', [0.06,0.035,0.7,0.95]);
g_main = gca;
hold on

%透明球(避免邊界隨螺旋槳變化)
[bal.x,bal.y,bal.z] = sphere;
bal.x = bal.x*0.5*stl_amplification;
bal.y = bal.y*0.5*stl_amplification;
bal.z = bal.z*0.5*stl_amplification;
ball = surf(bal.x,bal.y,bal.z,"FaceAlpha",0,"LineStyle","none");


%機架
F450_raw = stlread("F450_no_propeller.stl");
F450_poinit = stl_amplification*F450_raw.Points;           %取點
F450_conn = F450_raw.ConnectivityList;   %取三角形
clear F450_raw;
F450_triang = triangulation(F450_conn,F450_poinit);
F450 = trisurf(F450_triang,'facecolor',fuselage_color,'edgecolor','none');
hold on

%槳葉
propeller_raw = stlread("propeller.stl");
propeller_poinit = stl_amplification*propeller_raw.Points;           %取點
propeller_conn = propeller_raw.ConnectivityList;   %取三角形
clear propeller_raw;
propeller_triang = triangulation(propeller_conn,propeller_poinit);

for i=1:4
    propeller{i} = trisurf(propeller_triang,'facecolor',propeller_color,'edgecolor','none');
end
propeller_RT_B_to_motor = cell(4,1);
propeller_deg = [pi*0.1;pi*0.2;pi*0.3;pi*0.4];



%% 開燈
camlight("headlight")


%% 文字設定
digits_set='%5.2f';

Time_txt=text('String',['time: ', '00.00' ,' s'],...
              'Interpreter','latex',...
              'FontSize',30,...
              'Units','normalized',...
              'Position',[ 0.05 0.95 0]);

% t = data.t(1:3000);
t = data.t;
dt = t(2)-t(1);

%% 初始狀態
%透明球
ball.XData = bal.x + data.P(1,1);
ball.YData = bal.y + data.P(2,1);
ball.ZData = bal.z + data.P(3,1);

%機架
F450_dcm = angle2dcm (data.psi(1),data.theta(1),data.phi(1));
F450_RT = [F450_dcm',data.P(:,1);[0,0,0,1]];
F450_F450_poinit_new  = (F450_RT*[F450_poinit';ones(1,length(F450_poinit))])';
F450_F450_poinit_new=F450_F450_poinit_new(:,1:3);
F450.Vertices = F450_F450_poinit_new;

%槳葉
propeller_offset{1} = [ 159.1;  159.1; 196.7500]*0.001*stl_amplification;
propeller_offset{2} = [-159.1;  159.1; 196.7500]*0.001*stl_amplification;
propeller_offset{3} = [-159.1; -159.1; 196.7500]*0.001*stl_amplification;
propeller_offset{4} = [ 159.1; -159.1; 196.7500]*0.001*stl_amplification;



for i=1:4
    propeller_RT_B_to_motor{i} = [angle2dcm(propeller_deg(i),0,0)' propeller_offset{i};[0,0,0,1]];
    propeller_F450_poinit_new  = (F450_RT*propeller_RT_B_to_motor{i}*[propeller_poinit';ones(1,length(propeller_poinit))])';
    propeller_F450_poinit_new=propeller_F450_poinit_new(:,1:3);
    propeller{i}.Vertices = propeller_F450_poinit_new;
end


%% 全部的軌跡
data_Trajectory_point=[ones(1,length(t))*data.P(1,1);ones(1,length(t))*data.P(2,1);ones(1,length(t))*data.P(3,1)];
data_Trajectory=plot3(data_Trajectory_point(1,:),data_Trajectory_point(2,:),data_Trajectory_point(3,:), ...
    '-o','MarkerSize',5,'MarkerFaceColor',data_color ...
    ,'MarkerEdgeColor','none',"LineWidth",2,'Color',data_color,'MarkerIndices',1:10:length(t));



%% 航點與期望軌跡

hold on
p(2)=plot3(desired_trajectory.p(1,:),desired_trajectory.p(2,:),desired_trajectory.p(3,:),'-',"Color",reference_color,"LineWidth",1.5);
hold on
plot3(desired_trajectory.waypoint(1,1:end),desired_trajectory.waypoint(2,1:end),desired_trajectory.waypoint(3,1:end),"Color",waypoint_color,'LineStyle','-.',"LineWidth",1.5);
hold on
plot3(desired_trajectory.waypoint(1,1),desired_trajectory.waypoint(2,1),desired_trajectory.waypoint(3,1),'o',"Color",reference_color,'LineStyle','none',"LineWidth",2);
hold on
p(1)=plot3(desired_trajectory.waypoint(1,2:end),desired_trajectory.waypoint(2,2:end),desired_trajectory.waypoint(3,2:end),'o',"Color",waypoint_color,'LineStyle','none',"LineWidth",2);

legend([p data_Trajectory],'Waypoint','Desired trajectory','Cascade PID','Location',[0.5955 0.9003 0.1107 0.0751])

xlabel("X(m)");
ylabel("Y(m)");
zlabel("Z(m)");


% axis equal;
axis padded
grid on;
view(3)
plot_set(16);


writerObj = VideoWriter(video_name,'MPEG-4');
writerObj.FrameRate = 25;
writerObj.Quality = 100;
open(writerObj);
n = length(t);


%% 其他子圖
RAD2DEG = 180/pi; 
p_y = [data.x;
       data.y;
       data.z;
       RAD2DEG*data.phi;
       RAD2DEG*data.theta;
       RAD2DEG*data.psi];

subplot("Position",[0.78 0.82 0.2 0.13]);
p(1) = plot(t,p_y(1,:),"Color",data_color,"LineStyle","-");
hold on
plot(t,desired_trajectory.p(1,:),"LineStyle","--","Color",reference_color);
set(gca,'xticklabel',[])
g(1) = gca;
ylabel("$x$ (m)","Interpreter","latex");
plot_set(16,2);

subplot("Position",[0.78 0.67 0.2 0.13]);
p(2) = plot(t,p_y(2,:),"Color",data_color,"LineStyle","-");
hold on
plot(t,desired_trajectory.p(2,:),"LineStyle","--","Color",reference_color);
set(gca,'xticklabel',[])
g(2) = gca;
ylabel("$y$ (m)","Interpreter","latex");
plot_set(16,2);

subplot("Position",[0.78 0.52 0.2 0.13]);
p(3) = plot(t,p_y(3,:),"Color",data_color,"LineStyle","-");
hold on
plot(t,desired_trajectory.p(3,:),"LineStyle","--","Color",reference_color);
set(gca,'xticklabel',[])
g(3) = gca;
ylabel("$z$ (m)","Interpreter","latex");
plot_set(16,2);

subplot("Position",[0.78 0.37 0.2 0.13]);
p(4) = plot(t,p_y(4,:),'Color',data_color,"LineStyle","-");
set(gca,'xticklabel',[])
g(4) = gca;
ylabel("$\phi$ ($^{\circ}$)","Interpreter","latex");
plot_set(16,2);

subplot("Position",[0.78 0.22 0.2 0.13]);
p(5) = plot(t,p_y(5,:),'Color',data_color,"LineStyle","-");
set(gca,'xticklabel',[])
g(5) = gca;
ylabel("$\theta$ ($^{\circ}$)","Interpreter","latex");
plot_set(16,2);

subplot("Position",[0.78 0.07 0.2 0.13]);
p(6) = plot(t,p_y(6,:),'Color',data_color,"LineStyle","-");
hold on
plot(t,RAD2DEG*desired_trajectory.psi_d(1,:),"LineStyle","--","Color",reference_color);
ylabel("$\psi$ ($^{\circ}$)","Interpreter","latex");
xlabel("Time (s)","Interpreter","latex");
g(6) = gca;
plot_set(16,2);


for j=1:6
    time = t(1);
    p(j).XData = time;
    p(j).YData = p_y(j,1);
    min_p_y = min(p_y(j,1:4));
    max_p_y = max(p_y(j,1:4));
    lim_y_offset = 10;
    if abs(max_p_y-min_p_y)>lim_y_offset
        lim_y_offset = abs(max_p_y-min_p_y);
    end
    g(j).YLim=[min_p_y-0.05*lim_y_offset max_p_y+0.05*lim_y_offset];

    if (time < 0.7*time_window)
        g(j).XLim=[0 time_window];
    else
        g(j).XLim=[time-0.7*time_window time+0.3*time_window];
    end
end
%% 繪製動畫準備結束

%% 起始前暫停影像
for i=1:25
     writeVideo(writerObj,getframe(video));
end
%%%

%% 開始錄製
for i = 1:n/4
ii=4*i;
%透明球
ball.XData = bal.x + data.P(1,ii);
ball.YData = bal.y + data.P(2,ii);
ball.ZData = bal.z + data.P(3,ii);

%機架
F450_dcm = angle2dcm (data.psi(ii),data.theta(ii),data.phi(ii));
F450_RT = [F450_dcm',data.P(:,ii);[0,0,0,1]];
F450_F450_poinit_new  = (F450_RT*[F450_poinit';ones(1,length(F450_poinit))])';
F450_F450_poinit_new=F450_F450_poinit_new(:,1:3);
F450.Vertices = F450_F450_poinit_new;

%槳葉

for j=1:4
    propeller_deg(j) = propeller_deg(j) + (-1)^(j)*0.3*pi;
    propeller_RT_B_to_motor{j} = [angle2dcm(propeller_deg(j),0,0)' propeller_offset{j};[0,0,0,1]];
    propeller_F450_poinit_new  = (F450_RT*propeller_RT_B_to_motor{j}*[propeller_poinit';ones(1,length(propeller_poinit))])';
    propeller_F450_poinit_new=propeller_F450_poinit_new(:,1:3);
    propeller{j}.Vertices = propeller_F450_poinit_new;
end

data_Trajectory.XData(1,i:end)=data.P(1,ii);
data_Trajectory.YData(1,i:end)=data.P(2,ii);
data_Trajectory.ZData(1,i:end)=data.P(3,ii);

% 子圖更新
time = t(ii);
for j=1:6
    
    if (time < 0.7*time_window)
        p(j).XData = t(1:ii);
        p(j).YData = p_y(j,1:ii);
        min_p_y = min(p_y(j,1:ii));
        max_p_y = max(p_y(j,1:ii));
        lim_y_offset = 10;
        if abs(max_p_y-min_p_y)>lim_y_offset
            lim_y_offset = abs(max_p_y-min_p_y);
        end
        g(j).YLim=[min_p_y-0.05*lim_y_offset max_p_y+0.05*lim_y_offset];
        g(j).XLim=[0 time_window];
    else 
        p(j).XData = t(1:ii);
        p(j).YData = p_y(j,1:ii);
        min_p_y = min(p_y(j,ceil(ii-0.7*time_window/dt):ii));
        max_p_y = max(p_y(j,ceil(ii-0.7*time_window/dt):ii));
        lim_y_offset = 10;
        if abs(max_p_y-min_p_y)>lim_y_offset
            lim_y_offset = abs(max_p_y-min_p_y);
        end
        g(j).YLim=[min_p_y-0.05*lim_y_offset max_p_y+0.05*lim_y_offset];
        if time+0.3*time_window < t(end)
            g(j).XLim=[time-0.7*time_window time+0.3*time_window];
        else
            g(j).XLim=[t(end)-time_window t(end)];
        end
    end
end

%%字體
Time_txt.String=['time: ', num2str(t(ii),'%5.2f') ,' s'];


drawnow limitrate;
writeVideo(writerObj,getframe(video));
end

%% 最後暫停畫面
ii=length(t);
%透明球
ball.XData = bal.x + data.P(1,ii);
ball.YData = bal.y + data.P(2,ii);
ball.ZData = bal.z + data.P(3,ii);

%機架
F450_dcm = angle2dcm (data.psi(ii),data.theta(ii),data.phi(ii));
F450_RT = [F450_dcm',data.P(:,ii);[0,0,0,1]];
F450_F450_poinit_new  = (F450_RT*[F450_poinit';ones(1,length(F450_poinit))])';
F450_F450_poinit_new=F450_F450_poinit_new(:,1:3);
F450.Vertices = F450_F450_poinit_new;

%槳葉
for j=1:4
    propeller_deg(j) = propeller_deg(j) + (-1)^(j)*0.3*pi;
    propeller_RT_B_to_motor{j} = [angle2dcm(propeller_deg(j),0,0)' propeller_offset{j};[0,0,0,1]];
    propeller_F450_poinit_new  = (F450_RT*propeller_RT_B_to_motor{j}*[propeller_poinit';ones(1,length(propeller_poinit))])';
    propeller_F450_poinit_new=propeller_F450_poinit_new(:,1:3);
    propeller{j}.Vertices = propeller_F450_poinit_new;
end

%%字體
Time_txt.String=['time: ', num2str(t(ii),'%5.2f') ,' s'];
drawnow limitrate;
writeVideo(writerObj,getframe(video));
for i=1:25%結束暫停影像
    writeVideo(writerObj,getframe(video));
end
%%%
close(writerObj);

function new_data=col_row_check(data)
   new_data=data;
   [m,n]=size(data);
   if(m>n)
     new_data = new_data';
   end
end

entry.title: 動畫 lesson 3
entry.content:
這一篇基於前一篇引入 STL 後，將四旋翼模型拆分成機架與槳葉。這樣拆分引入可以在後面繪製動畫時使螺旋槳各自轉動。

# 成果展示:

範例的 STL 可以在這邊下載: 載點

# 程式碼:

clc;clear;close all
addpath(genpath('.\450'))%路徑可能需要更改

%機架
F450_raw = stlread("F450_no_propeller.stl");
F450_poinit = F450_raw.Points;           %取點
F450_conn = F450_raw.ConnectivityList;   %取三角形
clear F450_raw;
F450_triang = triangulation(F450_conn,F450_poinit);
F450 = trisurf(F450_triang,'facecolor',[0.9,0.9,0.8],'edgecolor','none');
hold on


%槳葉
propeller_raw = stlread("propeller.stl");
propeller_poinit = propeller_raw.Points;           %取點
propeller_conn = propeller_raw.ConnectivityList;   %取三角形
clear propeller_raw;
propeller_triang = triangulation(propeller_conn,propeller_poinit);

for i=1:4
    propeller{i} = trisurf(propeller_triang,'facecolor',[0 0 0],'edgecolor','none');
end


propeller_RT_B_to_motor = cell(4,1);
propeller_RT_B_to_motor{1} = [angle2dcm(pi*0.1,0,0)' [ 159.1;  159.1; 196.7500]*0.001;[0,0,0,1]];
propeller_RT_B_to_motor{2} = [angle2dcm(pi*0.2,0,0)' [-159.1;  159.1; 196.7500]*0.001;[0,0,0,1]];
propeller_RT_B_to_motor{3} = [angle2dcm(pi*0.3,0,0)' [-159.1; -159.1; 196.7500]*0.001;[0,0,0,1]];
propeller_RT_B_to_motor{4} = [angle2dcm(pi*0.4,0,0)' [ 159.1; -159.1; 196.7500]*0.001;[0,0,0,1]];

for i=1:4
propeller_poinit_new  = (propeller_RT_B_to_motor{i}*[propeller_poinit';ones(1,length(propeller_poinit))])';
propeller_poinit_new=propeller_poinit_new(:,1:3);
propeller{i}.Vertices = propeller_poinit_new;
end
axis equal

% axis vis3d
box on 
camlight("headlight")%打光
xlabel("x")
ylabel("y")
zlabel("z")

entry.title: 動畫 lesson 2
entry.content:
這一篇將介紹如何在 MATLAB 中的 Figure 中引入 STL 檔案。

首先了解 STL 是甚麼可以參考: 了解 STL 檔案格式。不論是從網路或是使用 Solid work 自己繪製。都可以獲得 STL 檔案的模型。檔案中主要內容是點跟向量。向量表示那些點組成三角形表面。這裡特別建議 STL 檔案中的原點最好在使用前先用程式設定好，用 MATLAB 內建的可以調整與儲存但麻煩許多也不直觀。

# 成果展示:

範例的 STL 可以在這邊下載: 載點

# 程式碼:

% plot stl and animation example 
clc;clear;close all
addpath(genpath('.\STL\250'))%路徑需要更改
% addpath說明
% 1、文件在当前路径下：使用 load('***.mat')
% 2、文件在下一级路径下：使用 load (' .\下一级路径的文件名\***.mat ');
% 3、文件在上一级路径下：使用 load (' ..\***.mat ');
% 4、文件在平行文件夹内：使用 load (' ..\平行的文件夹\***.mat');

%%
Drone_raw = stlread("250.STL");
Drone_poinit = Drone_raw.Points;         %取點
Drone_conn = Drone_raw.ConnectivityList; %取三角形資料
point_x= mean(Drone_poinit(:,1),1);      %置中(但原點最好前處理解決掉，例如在SW中轉STL時就設定好重心位置)
Drone_poinit(:,1) = Drone_poinit(:,1)-point_x;
Drone_triang = triangulation(Drone_conn,Drone_poinit);%stlwrite(F_16_new,"F_16_new.stl")
Drone = trisurf(Drone_triang,'facecolor',[0.9,0.9,0.8],'edgecolor','none');

% axis equal
axis vis3d

box on 
camlight("headlight")%打光
xlabel("x")
ylabel("y")
zlabel("z")

%% rotate
Drone_poinit_new = Drone_poinit;

for i = 0:0.5:360
    Drone_position = [0;0;i/360/2]; %高度升到0.5米
    Drone_dcm = angle2dcm (0,0,i/360*2*pi); %內建的DCM會與推導的差一個轉置
    Drone_RT = [Drone_dcm' Drone_position;[0 0 0 1]];
    Drone_poinit_new  = (Drone_RT*[Drone_poinit';ones(1,length(Drone_poinit))])';
    Drone.Vertices = Drone_poinit_new(:,1:3);
    zlim([0,inf]);
    drawnow limitrate
end

entry.title: 動畫 lesson 1
entry.content:
本篇以一個簡單的例子說明如何用 MATLAB 函數。繪製目標為將函數 sin(2t)sin(2t)sin(2t) 以動畫形式展現。

# 主要函數介紹:

VideoWriter: 建立視訊物件。主要要設定 Quality 和 FrameRate。Quality 是質量基本上設定上限 100。FrameRate 則是幀數，每秒幾張圖須配合寫入做調整。

簡單舉例:

writerObj = VideoWriter(video_name,'MPEG-4');
writerObj.FrameRate = 25; %每秒幾張圖
writerObj.Quality = 100;
open(writerObj);

% 開始錄製(用迴圈)
for i=1:n
%
% 更新畫面....
%
drawnow limitrate;% 立即繪製
writeVideo(writerObj,getframe(video));
end

% 結束錄製
close(writerObj);%一定要關閉才能錄製成功

# 成果展示:

前後暫停 1 秒。並且時間窗格設定為 5 秒，會跟著當前時間顯示函數。

# 程式碼:

clc;clear;close all;

%% 生成資料
dt = 0.01;
t_end = 10;
t = 0:dt:t_end;
y = sin(2*t);
video_name = 'sin wave';
time_window = 5;%Unit:sec

%% 繪圖
video=figure();
set(video,'Position',[1 49 1.7067e+03 946]); %需放大錄製，不然畫質很差
p1 = plot(t,y(1,:),"Color","b","LineStyle","-","LineWidth",2);
hold on
circle = plot(0,y(1),"Color","r","LineStyle","none","Marker","o","MarkerSize",10,"LineWidth",2);
xlim tight
ylim padded
ylabel("$\sin (2t)$","Interpreter","latex");
xlabel("Time (s)","Interpreter","latex");
grid on %打開網格 
g1 = gca;
g1.FontSize = 20;

% 顯示時間
Time_txt=text('String',['time: ', '00.00' ,' s'],...
              'Interpreter','latex',...
              'FontSize',30,...
              'Units','normalized',...
              'Position',[ 0.8 1.04]);

%% 錄影設定
writerObj = VideoWriter(video_name,'MPEG-4');
writerObj.FrameRate = 25; %每秒幾張圖(如要顯示時間要注意這個設定)
writerObj.Quality = 100;
open(writerObj);

%% 起始前暫停影像
p1.XData = t(1:1);
p1.YData = y(1,1);

circle.XData = t(1);
p1.YData = y(1,1);

min_y = min(y(1:1));
max_y = max(y(1:1));
lim_y_offset = 5;
if abs(max_y-min_y)>lim_y_offset
    lim_y_offset = abs(max_y-min_y);
end
g1.YLim=[min_y-0.05*lim_y_offset max_y+0.05*lim_y_offset];
g1.XLim=[0 time_window];

for i=1:25 %暫停一秒 
     writeVideo(writerObj,getframe(video));
end


%% 開始錄製
for i = 1:length(t)/4
ii = 4*i;

time = t(ii);
p1.XData = t(1:ii);
p1.YData = y(1,1:ii);

circle.XData = t(ii);
circle.YData = y(1,ii);


% 檢測顯示線的Y方向最大刻度
min_y = min(y(1:ii));
max_y = max(y(1:ii));
lim_y_offset = 10; % 設定最小Y軸長度
if abs(max_y-min_y)>lim_y_offset
    lim_y_offset = abs(max_y-min_y);
end
g1.YLim=[min_y-0.05*lim_y_offset max_y+0.05*lim_y_offset];% 設定Y軸

% 設定X軸
if (time < 0.7*time_window)
    g1.XLim=[0 time_window];
else
    g1.XLim=[time-0.7*time_window time+0.3*time_window];
end

% 文字更新
Time_txt.String=['time: ', num2str(t(ii),'%5.2f') ,' s'];

drawnow limitrate;% 立即繪製
writeVideo(writerObj,getframe(video));
end

%% 最後暫停畫面(主要是讓時間可以顯示整數)
% 子圖更新
ii = length(t);
time = t(ii);
p1.XData = t(1:ii);
p1.YData = y(1,1:ii);

circle.XData = t(ii);
circle.YData = y(1,ii);


% 檢測顯示線的Y方向最大刻度
min_y = min(y(1:ii));
max_y = max(y(1:ii));
lim_y_offset = 10; % 設定最小Y軸長度
if abs(max_y-min_y)>lim_y_offset
    lim_y_offset = abs(max_y-min_y);
end
g1.YLim=[min_y-0.05*lim_y_offset max_y+0.05*lim_y_offset];% 設定Y軸

% 設定X軸
if (time < 0.7*time_window)
    g1.XLim=[0 time_window];
else
    g1.XLim=[time-0.7*time_window time+0.3*time_window];
end

% 文字更新
Time_txt.String=['time: ', num2str(t(ii),'%5.2f') ,' s'];
for i=1:25 %結束暫停影像(一秒)
    writeVideo(writerObj,getframe(video));
end
close(writerObj);%一定要關閉才能錄製成功

# 回家作業

配合前一份旋轉方塊的程式碼，可以用它展示姿態變化。

entry.title: Matlab figure 筆記2
entry.content:
# 示範在空間中畫一個方塊。並運用方向餘弦矩陣 (DCM)，畫不同姿態的方塊

重點函數說明:
patch 畫方塊

quiver3 畫箭頭

angle2dcm 產生方向餘弦矩陣來旋轉方塊 (預設為 (yaw,pitch,roll))

drawnow 更新 figure

clc;clear;close all;

fig(1) = figure("Name","cube");
vertices = [-0.5 -0.5 -0.5;
             0.5 -0.5 -0.5;
             0.5  0.5 -0.5;
            -0.5  0.5 -0.5;
            -0.5 -0.5  0.5;
             0.5 -0.5  0.5;
             0.5  0.5  0.5;
            -0.5  0.5  0.5];%正方體有八個頂點
faces = [1 2 6 5;2 3 7 6;3 4 8 7;4 1 5 8;1 2 3 4;5 6 7 8];%其6個面的頂點，點的順序根據vertices
cube = patch('Vertices',vertices,'Faces',faces,'Facecolor','none');
Vx_ini = [1 0 0]';
Vy_ini = [0 1 0]';
Vz_ini = [0 0 1]';
Vx = [1 0 0]';
Vy = [0 1 0]';
Vz = [0 0 1]';
hold on
Xaxis = quiver3(0,0,0,Vx(1),Vx(2),Vx(3),1.5,'r','filled','Linewidth',2);
Yaxis = quiver3(0,0,0,Vy(1),Vy(2),Vy(3),1.5,'g','filled','Linewidth',2);
Zaxis = quiver3(0,0,0,Vz(1),Vz(2),Vz(3),1.5,'b','filled','Linewidth',2);
ax=gca;
ax.FontSize = 14;
ax.FontName = 'Times New Roman';
grid on %開網格
view(3) %3D來看
axis equal  %沿每個軸對數據單位使用相同的長度。
axis([-1.5 2.2 -1.5 2.2 -1.5 2.2]);

n = 7;
for i = 1:n
dcm = angle2dcm (pi/4*(i-1),0,0);% 旋轉餘弦矩陣(與筆者常用的差一個轉置)

cube.Vertices = vertices*dcm';
Vx=dcm'*Vx_ini;
Vy=dcm'*Vy_ini;
Vz=dcm'*Vz_ini;
Xaxis.UData=Vx(1);Xaxis.VData=Vx(2);Xaxis.WData=Vx(3);
Yaxis.UData=Vy(1);Yaxis.VData=Vy(2);Yaxis.WData=Vy(3);
Zaxis.UData=Vz(1);Zaxis.VData=Vz(2);Zaxis.WData=Vz(3);

drawnow;%以新的姿態重新繪製方塊
if(i<n)
    fprintf("Press any key to continue.\n");
    pause;%暫停直到按任意鍵
else
    fprintf("Rotation display ends.\n");
end

end

圖:

entry.title: Matlab figure 筆記1
entry.content:
# 繪圖的精神為清晰明顯的表達所有資訊

此次所用資料生成
假設有如下生成的資料需要繪圖

# 基本的繪圖

基本上繪圖要有

X 座標 (含單位)
Y 座標 (含單位)
圖例 (當此圖有多條線時)
標題 (可有可無，可在報告中的標號時說明)

其中 plot (建議多參考官網的說明) 有幾個重要屬性基本都要調整使其繪的圖可以清晰，LineStyle、Color 和 LineWidth。
以下示範簡單繪製θ\thetaθ 與θm\theta_mθm​ 在同一張圖。因為θm\theta_mθm​ 含有噪音，要優先畫才不會蓋到θ\thetaθ


此程式碼繪的圖有幾個問題

線粗細可以在粗一些
圖例擋到線
字太小 (這要根據你最終要放到的報告中調整，簡單來說要與報告內文相同)
不知道最終值是不是在 1 附近

# 高級的繪圖

除了剛剛的缺點，這裡還更改了圖例顯示的順序，用物件接住 plot，在對此物件標示圖例，此法可以延伸應用到僅標示要標示的線 (參考雙 Y 軸圖的程式碼)


小提示：每個東西都有很多屬性可以設定。令一個變數接住，並且後面不加分號。你就能在 Command Window 看到新世界 (有很多屬性可以調整)。將上面程式碼中的 legend 改成像這樣

l = legend(p,'\theta_m','\theta')

# 繪圖函數設定

因為每張圖都有類似的共同的設定，因此將其包成函數，以後畫圖就很輕鬆，這是我常用的繪圖設定函數

則使用以下程式碼就能畫出相同的圖

# 子母圖

有時需要放大圖中某個地方等需求，就可以這樣畫

程式碼如下

# 雙 Y 軸圖

有時要繪製在一起的資料量級相差太大，但又想繪製在一起觀察，就可以考慮有效利用兩邊 Y 軸來繪圖

前後問題改起來很麻煩可以參考這裡解決

# 用迴圈存圖

最後耍帥的用程式碼將全部圖片存到指定地點，後續可用 Latex 自動讀檔製作報告，使用函數 print

備註：這裡設定 -depsc 是存成向量檔 (.eps)，放大才不會有像素感。
